channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Andover to create a relaxing garden that suits the whole family, including the children and the couple's dog, Tyson.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Telford to design a cat-friendly, enchanted garden for Lesley and her beloved moggy Gizmo.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives strangers Harry and Kaylum the cash to buy, renovate and sell a house in Ashton-under-Lyne. Can they put their differences aside and make a profit on their majestic detached house.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Hello Campers
channel.desc: Relive the glory days of good clean Hi-De-Hi style fun with this oral history of Britain's holiday camps. Hello Campers.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Tool Club
channel.desc: In Dumfries, Lucy's bookshop turns a new chapter. And in the Tool Bus, a vintage sewing box is transformed into a cocktail bar.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Stefan reports on the safety of American chlorinated chicken. Sian learns about the side effects of detox teas. Food made from insects too.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives strangers Harry and Kaylum the cash to buy, renovate and sell a house in Ashton-under-Lyne. Can they put their differences aside and make a profit on their majestic detached house.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey Bussell
channel.desc: Darcey begins her royal road trip at the Highland Games in Balmoral, before sampling royal whisky and attempting a dance at the Ghillies Ball.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Is British grass-fed beef the best regarding food miles? Is bottled water is worth the price. Plus, the healthiness of lunchtime meals.

channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Telford to design a cat-friendly, enchanted garden for Lesley and her beloved moggy Gizmo.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Groupie Girl
channel.desc: Sally runs away from her strict upbringing to become a rock band's groupie. A cautionary tale of hairy hippies and heartbreak. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Die Screaming Marianne
channel.desc: Marianne, a nightclub dancer, is on the run from vicious criminals. Trickery and betrayal are around every corner in this suspense-filled thriller. Susan George stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Got It Made
channel.desc: Norfolk-set coming-of-age drama. Mere days before her wedding, an aristocratic girl discovers some hideous truths about the people closest to her. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Real Thick Glasses
channel.desc: Solomon Watkins' quirky take as he interviews Michael, owner of the world's most unique collection of Really Thick Glasses. Funded and supported by Together TV and Cat Flap Media.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Reel Stories
channel.desc: Cinema projectionists make magic with light. As digital projection makes them obsolete, this film records the working lives of projectionists in the heyday of this dying art.

channel.title: Right To Roam

channel.title: Garden Rescue

channel.desc: Chris and Lee are in Wilmslow to transform Adam and Lauren's tired, boring garden into a Chinese-inspired space with a woodland vibe.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Hello Campers

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Black Beauty
channel.desc: Faithful version of classic children's tale featuring the adventures of spirited horse Black Beauty. Can her young owner get her back? Mark Lester - of Oliver! fame - stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Futtock's End
channel.desc: Ronnie Barker stars as General Futtock, who has a motley group of guests stay at his country estate - and chaos ensues. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: What's Good For The Goose
channel.desc: Comedy. Norman Wisdom stars as a bank manager who upends his square existence to join some youthful hippies. Will this new groovy energy bring the spark back to his marriage.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Magnificent Seven Deadly Sins
channel.desc: Bawdy seventies sketch comedy film starring a bevy of British talent from Bruce Forsyth and Harry Secombe to Joan Simms and June Whitfield. Contains 70s social attitudes.
